Package gears.sidescroller.world.structures

package gears.sidescroller.world.structures
Structures are matrices of tiles which can be inserted into a TileMap. These are analogous to naturally generated structures in games such as Minecraft. Currently, these don't do much, just providing patterns to copy-paste into the TileMap, but future versions will see Structures become more complex, having their own sets of Machines and Items, becoming mini Areas in a way.
  • Class
    Description
    GearRoomGenerator
    generates structures that can teach the player how gears and power work
    GeneratesStructures
    Classes with this interface can randomly generate structures.
    PassageGenerator
    generates random passages
    RoomGenerator
    generates random rooms
    Structure
    A Structure is currently simply a Matrix which gets inserted into a TileMap.
    StructureGenerator
    The StructureGenerator is used to randomly generate Structures for random Area generation, choosing from among structure types it is provided.
